name: Signal 96
description:
The original plan was to make a game where you have to connect soulmates together. But it had to happen under the right circumstances. You wouldn't want to bring a dog, while your soulmate is alergic to dogs. Everyone would have different love interests that would help these people get together. 

Also their happyness is connected to each other, this spiritual connecting can raise the joy in both when one of them has a good experience. (Like someone finding flowers when they are a Flower-Lover) But when they get to many bad experiences they will decide this just isn't their day, go home and most likely never meet each other again.

You as overseeing entity can use your fate-bending skills to summon different object. Dogs running around or a sudden boost in speed can help the lovers meet at the right moment. 

Sadly, we didn't get to finish the gameplay. But we are still very proud of what we put together in these 2 amazing days. Thanks for checking us out!
